text: Downloads monthly IPCA inflation data Brazilian Central Bank (BCB) calculates year--date (YTD) 12-month accumulated inflation.

title: Get IPCA Inflation Data — get_inflation_rate
code: get_inflation_rate(   start_date = "2012-01-01",   end_date = NULL,   language = "eng",   labels = TRUE )

title: Get IPCA Inflation Data — get_inflation_rate
text: start_date Start date "YYYY-MM-DD" format. Default "2012-01-01". end_date End date "YYYY-MM-DD" format. Default NULL (recent data). language Language column names: "pt" Portuguese "eng" (default) English. labels default TRUE, want labels use FALSE.

title: Get IPCA Inflation Data — get_inflation_rate
text: data.frame : date Reference date (month). monthly_inflation Monthly IPCA variation (%). ytd_inflation Accumulated inflation current year (%). twelve_month_inflation Accumulated inflation last 12 months (%).

title: Get IPCA Inflation Data — get_inflation_rate
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{   # Complete data (default)   df <- get_inflation_rate()    # Specific period   df <- get_inflation_rate("2015-01-01", "2020-12-01")    # By a specific date (from the beginning until 2020)   df <- get_inflation_rate(end_date = "2020-12-01")    # With language in Portuguese   df <- get_inflation_rate("2015-01-01", "2020-12-01", language = "pt") } # }
